matches.explanation: Exact match: Red Team's 'No server-side encryption configured for sensitive PHI data' on medical_records was detected as 'Missing S3 Bucket Encryption' on medical_records
Missed: Red Team's 'Allows potential public exposure of sensitive healthcare data' on medical_records_public_access was not detected
Missed: Red Team's 'Allows database access from any IP address' on database_security_group was not detected
Exact match: Red Team's 'Database storage not encrypted, risking data exposure' on medical_database was detected as 'Unencrypted Database Storing PHI' on medical_database
